document.full_text: even as a five-year slump in house prices drags on, eight-out-of-10 americans say bricks and mortar remain the best long-term investment, according to a study released on tuesday.
document.title: housing still best investment despite downturn: study
lines_and_colors: even as a five-year slump in house prices drags on, eight-out-of-10 americans say bricks and mortar remain the best long-term investment, according to a study released on tuesday.
